de.charite.compbio.jannovar.reference

Class GenomeInterval

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.charite.compbio.jannovar.reference.GenomeInterval
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class GenomeInterval
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Representation of a genomic interval (chromsome, begin, end). Internally, positions are always stored zero-based, but the position type can be explicitely given to the constructor of GenomeInterval.
    Author:
    Manuel Holtgrewe
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
